title: summoners rift unfair for upper-right team top lane
body: i just noticed its unfair for the upper-right team's top lane because they can be ganked from their triangle bush while the other team is harder to gank because their triangle bush is behind the tower.

Both 'triangle bushes' are behind the towers, its just because of the camera angle that the blue team's bottom tier 1 tower seems more imposing than the top lane for the red team.

theres lots of possible ganks in every lane. that brush can usually be warded, but a rek'sai coming from behind the tower on blue top side is a nearly impossible gank to disengage. just ward where you think you need to and it'll help you a lot

Change your Tactics per game. It isn't about fair or unfair, The map is Symmetrical (with the exclusions of certain objects) It keeps the game more interesting, while i am with the idea of adding Dominion in OCE and possible having permanent Map Skins available to play, i don't think classic Summoner's Rift should be changed. sure add another Map mode or a different looking Summoner's Rift but don't change what already works. If you have problems getting ganked in top lane, Ward where you can get ganked, assume the jungler is there if you cannot see him, do not over extend and most importantly if you are using wards keep a constant eye on the minimap. That is a mistake we all do make, getting ganked is probably going to happen when the game is getting intense. If you see someone engaging randomly assume it could be a gank.
